screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .c4d file in Maxon Cinema 4D 2023
screenshot.caption: C4D file open in Maxon Cinema 4D 2023

description: Cinema 4D has many tools to create realistic images and graphics for movies, games, architectural design, and motion graphics. The C4D file is the main file type associated with Cinema 4D. When you save your model, Cinema 4D creates the C4D file to store all of the information about the model.
NOTE: People also use the term "C4D" as an abbreviation for the program. Cinema 4D is available in English, German, Spanish, French, and other languages.
